title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Microprocessor architecture, Address space and its partitions, Assembling Language programming, Interfacing ROM and RAM, Input/output devices, Interfacing I/O devices to microprocessor, programmable peripheral interface, programmable interrupt controller, Development of Monitor program. Sensors and transducers, analogue signal processing, multiplexes and demultiplexes, sampleand-hold circuits, ACD and DAC devices, Interrupt facilities of microprocessors, handshaking techniques, interrupt driven and dedicated controllers. Development of algorithms, Programming techniques, interfacing feedback loops. System development requirements, Overall system designs, hardware design, software design, typical examples.
